resource: 1001749.description=CVT is a type of transmission with an infinite number of gear ratios that are always changing depending upon the relative speed of the vehicle and the engine rpm. There are several types of CVTs. Hybrid Synergy Drive<sup>®</sup> uses an electronically controlled CVT (ECVT) which integrates a planetary gear set into the drivetrain. 1001749.vtc=true 1001749.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001749.derived=false
